description: This file declares the 'Response' class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which is derived from a Message class. It provides methods to access response-related data such as ID, error, and result status, and ensures proper object management with deleted copy operations.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message with methods to access its ID, error, and result status.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the response.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response contains a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result object from the response.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response indicates an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error object from the response.
